summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 1st Avenue North, from Spokane Street to Duwamish Waterway, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7306 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
